short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin for Alma printing, CSS, Javascript, and other customizations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin adds extra functionality within Alma.

- Print pull slips 
- Highlight form fields
- Custom CSS with advanced condition controls
- Custom Javascript
- Create PO Lines and inventory from a spreadsheet
- Import/export settings to share with others

Coming soon:

- Print labels
- Form macros
